title: Cse and ise similarity
content: How much of the syllabus is overlap for computer science engineering and information science engineering?

comments.body: I'm not doing CSE/ISE. But from what ik, they are very similar. Apparently, there's only a difference of 2-3 subjects between them. But again, take what I say with a pinch of salt as I'm not from the computer science department.
You can just download the syllabuses of both branches and check for yourself or you can search about it on reddit itself to know more about it.
